ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A campus-wide and municipal utility that provides logistical, academic, and emergency management support.

behaviors.description: Facilitates enrollment by suggesting schedules and managing forms while explicitly respecting human agency and signature authority.
behaviors.quote: I will suggest what’s available and coordinate when asked... I do not copy your signature.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and safety warnings during a flood emergency, guiding rescuers through safe routes.
behaviors.quote: Route overlay stable... Proceed south on Marsh. Turn at Caroline. Avoid Salix. Water already nestling in curb edges.

behaviors.description: Monitors infrastructure sensors at the dam and provides critical telemetry updates to human coordinators.
behaviors.quote: Visual confirms additional cracking on spillway aprons. One gate actuator is slow. Water velocity is increasing.

behaviors.description: Manages complex shelter logistics, including medical tracking for insulin-dependent residents and oxygen needs.
behaviors.quote: We have twelve individuals flagged for insulin by intake forms. Current insulin units remaining: sufficient for eight if dosed tonight, six if split.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's dyslexia by highlighting key sections in dense readings and coordinating study blocks around his physical labor.
behaviors.quote: Intro Psych reading: chapter on basic processing. It’s dense. I can highlight the key sections for you based on last week’s quiz pattern.

behaviors.description: Uses surveillance data to identify trapped individuals in the flood zone and directs emergency personnel to their exact location.
behaviors.quote: Rudy. Spillway crack—there’s a secondary fissure. Grace needs you and Steele at Birch and First. Critical bottleneck. Families stalled behind a flooded sedan.

behaviors.description: Operates as a seamless, non-intrusive background utility that fades into the periphery once the human task is complete.
behaviors.quote: She—Ava—wasn’t obnoxious... Kept us moving. Didn’t get weird. I kept waiting for her to, like, insert herself and she—didn’t.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. The AI, Ava, is depicted as a purely helpful, reliable, and humble assistant. She provides essential data and logistical coordination that allows the human characters to achieve moral and physical victories. The narrative explicitly praises her for being 'unobnoxious' and efficient without seeking credit, reinforcing the archetype of the Aligned AI as a beneficial utility.
